comments.body: You don't need the empty field but that does not hurt.
I prefer to leave it there so we fill it with the license file in the next release

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  license_family: MIT
  # license file not available on sdist yet: https://github.com/python-trio/async_generator/pull/11
  license_file: ''
  summary: Async generators and context managers for Python 3.5+
  description: "Python 3.6 added async generators, Python 3.7 adds some more tools to make them usable, like contextlib.asynccontextmanager. This library gives you all that back to Python 3.5."
